body.ENABLED: This package is enabled. It can be disabled using the button below.
body.DISABLED: This package is disabled. It can be enabled using the button below.
body.SETUP_FAILED: This package's setup process failed. Please check the logs for more information.

ENABLED.TITLE: Enable package
ENABLED.BODY: Are you sure you wish to enable these packages:

DISABLED.TITLE: Disable package
DISABLED.BODY: Are you sure you wish to disable these packages? The packages' data will remain in the database so if you reenable one, it will be in the same state it was in.

slug.LABEL: Name
slug.PLACEHOLDER: Visit the available packages page for names

delete.TITLE: Delete Packages
delete.BODY: Click "Delete" to permanently delete these Packages:
